data.eml:eml: Genus Bungona Harker, 1957 (Ephemeroptera: Baetidae) from China, with descriptions of three new species and a key to Oriental species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Weifang, Tong, Xiaoli (2019): Genus Bungona Harker, 1957 (Ephemeroptera: Baetidae) from China, with descriptions of three new species and a key to Oriental species. Zootaxa 4586 (3): 571-585, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4586.3.12
